description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which renders a collapsible sidebar for navigation with support for flat and grouped categories, responsive behavior for mobile and desktop, and handles user interactions such as selection and updating URL parameters.

methods.name: Sidebar({ title = "Categories", categories = [], onSelect })
methods.description: The main React functional component for rendering a collapsible sidebar with category navigation.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles user clicking on a category or item, updates URL search parameters, scrolls to top, and closes mobile menu if applicable.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ title = "Categories", categories = [], onSelect }) {$/

ctags.name:
w-72 bg-gradient-app text-white z-30 transition-transform ease-gentle
        md:translate-x-0
        md:sticky md:top-16
        md:h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]
        fixed top-16 bottom-0
        ${open ? "translate-x-0" : "-translate-x-full md:translate-x-0"}
